property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT
   <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || CAST("MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS"."DEMAND_ID" AS VARCHAR(255)) 
   || '::' || "MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS"."USING_ASSEMBLY_DEMAND_DATE"                        AS "ID",
   <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS"."ORGANIZATION_ID" 
   || '::' || "MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS"."INVENTORY_ITEM_ID"                                 AS "MaterialMasterPlant",
   CAST("MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS"."DEMAND_ID" AS VARCHAR(255))                              AS "MaterialRequirementNumber",
   CAST("MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS"."ORIGINATION_TYPE" AS VARCHAR(255))                       AS "DemandType",
   "MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS"."USING_ASSEMBLY_DEMAND_DATE"                                   AS "DeliveryDate",
   "MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS"."USING_REQUIREMENTS_QUANTITY"                                  AS "PlannedQuantity",
   "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."PRIMARY_UOM_CODE"                                                 AS "QuantityUnit",
   <%=sourceSystem%>                                                                       AS "SourceSystemInstance" 
FROM "MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS" AS "MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS" 
   INNER JOIN "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B" AS "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B" 
      ON "MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS"."ORGANIZATION_ID" = "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."ORGANIZATION_ID" 
      AND "MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS"."INVENTORY_ITEM_ID" = "MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B"."INVENTORY_ITEM_ID"
WHERE NULLIF(CAST("MRP_GROSS_REQUIREMENTS"."USING_ASSEMBLY_DEMAND_DATE" AS VARCHAR), '') IS NOT NULL

SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PBIM"."MANDT" || '::' || "PBIM"."MATNR" || '::' || 
        "PBIM"."WERKS" || '::' || "PBIM"."BEDAE" || '::' || "PBIM"."VERSB" || '::' || 
        COALESCE("PBIM"."PBDNR",'') || '::' || "PBED"."BDZEI" || '::' || "PBED"."PDATU"                    AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PBIM"."MANDT"                                                            AS "SourceSystemInstance",
    CAST("PBIM"."BDZEI" AS VARCHAR(255))                                                                   AS "MaterialRequirementNumber",
    CAST("PBED"."PDATU" AS TIMESTAMP)                                                                      AS "DeliveryDate",
    "PBED"."PLNMG"                                                                                         AS "PlannedQuantity",
    "PBED"."MEINS"                                                                                         AS "QuantityUnit",
    "PBIM"."BEDAE"                                                                                         AS "DemandType",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PBIM"."MANDT" || '::' || "PBIM"."MATNR" || '::' || "PBIM"."WERKS"        AS "MaterialMasterPlant"
FROM "PBIM" AS "PBIM"
    INNER JOIN "PBED" AS "PBED"
        ON "PBIM"."MANDT" = "PBED"."MANDT"
            AND "PBIM"."BDZEI" = "PBED"."BDZEI"
WHERE NULLIF("PBIM"."MANDT", '') IS NOT NULL
  AND NULLIF("PBED"."MANDT", '') IS NOT NULL
  AND "PBIM"."VERVS" = 'X'

display_name: MaterialRequirement - 00. SAP S/4 HANA Extraction Pool_S4H-HANA

property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PBIM"."MANDT" || '::' || "PBIM"."MATNR" || '::' || 
        "PBIM"."WERKS" || '::' || "PBIM"."BEDAE" || '::' || "PBIM"."VERSB" || '::' || 
        COALESCE("PBIM"."PBDNR",'') || '::' || "PBED"."BDZEI" || '::' || "PBED"."PDATU"                    AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PBIM"."MANDT"                                                            AS "SourceSystemInstance",
    CAST("PBIM"."BDZEI" AS VARCHAR(255))                                                                   AS "MaterialRequirementNumber",
    CAST("PBED"."PDATU" AS TIMESTAMP)                                                                      AS "DeliveryDate",
    "PBED"."PLNMG"                                                                                         AS "PlannedQuantity",
    "PBED"."MEINS"                                                                                         AS "QuantityUnit",
    "PBIM"."BEDAE"                                                                                         AS "DemandType",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "PBIM"."MANDT" || '::' || "PBIM"."MATNR" || '::' || "PBIM"."WERKS"        AS "MaterialMasterPlant"
FROM "PBIM" AS "PBIM"
    INNER JOIN "PBED" AS "PBED"
        ON "PBIM"."MANDT" = "PBED"."MANDT"
            AND "PBIM"."BDZEI" = "PBED"."BDZEI"
WHERE NULLIF("PBIM"."MANDT", '') IS NOT NULL
  AND NULLIF("PBED"."MANDT", '') IS NOT NULL
  AND "PBIM"."VERVS" = 'X'

SELECT DISTINCT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."DemandId" || '::' || "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."PeggingPEOUsingAssemblyDemandDate"          AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."PeggingPEOOrganizationId" || '::' || "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."PeggingPEOInventoryItemId"  AS "MaterialMasterPlant",
    CAST("FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."DemandId" AS VARCHAR(255))                                                                                                                      AS "MaterialRequirementNumber",
    CAST("FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."PeggingPEODemandOrderType" AS VARCHAR(255))                                                                                                     AS "DemandType",
    CAST("FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."PeggingPEOUsingAssemblyDemandDate" AS TIMESTAMP)                                                                                                AS "DeliveryDate",
    "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."PeggingPEODemandOrderQty"                                                                                                                            AS "PlannedQuantity",
    "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_ItemCategoriesPVO"."ItemCategoriesPEOUomCode"                                                                                                                             AS "QuantityUnit",
    <%=sourceSystem%>                                                                                                                                                                                           AS "SourceSystemInstance" 
FROM "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO" AS "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO" 
     INNER JOIN "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_ItemCategoriesPVO" AS "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_ItemCategoriesPVO" 
        ON "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_ItemCategoriesPVO"."ItemCategoriesPEOPlanId" = "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."PLANID" 
            AND "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_ItemCategoriesPVO"."InventoryItemId" = "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."PeggingPEOInventoryItemId"
            AND "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_ItemCategoriesPVO"."OrganizationId" = "FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."PeggingPEOOrganizationId"
WHERE NULLIF(CAST("FscmTopModelAM_MscAnalyticsTopAM_PlanningPeggingPVO"."PeggingPEOUsingAssemblyDemandDate" AS VARCHAR), '') IS NOT NULL
